Name: TinyTiny
About the game: 'Be a hero to save the Tiny Kingdom from crisis!' Experience a variety of exciting VR games! The mission of the game is to strategically use stones and minimons, which are basic weapons, to defeat the opponent. Key Features - Throw stones to reduce the opponent's HP. - Fight with various minimons. - They will want you to complete the mission within the time limit. - You can enjoy a total of 4 stages. - This is a multiplayer game. - You can only play in VR. - A minimum space of 2 square meters is required. - Only playable on Oculus.
